choices: They call me master
They call me mistress
1.content: Do your minions call you master...or mistress?
1.title: Guy or girl?

choices: In/on a valcano
A large flying airship
On a desurted island
Underground
In New Jersey
11.title: Home, evil home

choices: Yes
Some other settings
No continue with the current setting
111.content:
The naturally occurring phenomenon know as a "Volcano" has the perfect blend of imposingness, comfort and lava that a renowned overlord can only dream of. Luckily you start in one.

But would you like to be an overlord in a fantasy medieval setting?
111.title: In/on a valcano

choices: Vagruel - The Last Titan
Asmodai - The Mad wizard
Cragrig - The Barbarian or more options
1111.content: here are some character options, their bios included in their chapters. click on the last one for more options.
1111.title: Fantasy overlord

choices: Mordheim
Hope's End
11111.content:
Name: Vagruel

Alias: The Last Titan

Age: 41

Sex: Male

Race: Titan

Height: 10'4

Appearance: As a titan, Vagruel resembles a very large, wide built humanoid. The skin of a titan takes on the properties of different materials depending on their birthplace, parents and upbringing. Vagruel's skin is grey and rock like. No one knows what his face looks like since he almost always wears his custom forged suit of armor.

Bio: Many years ago, the titan race was numerous. They were calm and hard to anger creatures, leading a nomadic lifestyle, offering help to any other races they met on their travels. They were gentle giants in every sense of the world, there were of course exceptions, but none of them deviated as much as Vagruel did. He despised the fact that his brethren wasted their time helping weaker and vulnerable creatures. As his discontent grew more and more with every passing day, he eventually got enough and in the middle of the night he ran away from his clan's camp. From that point onward he used his size and strength to subjugate countless villages, towns and even castles. When he amassed a large enough army, he ordered every other titan to be killed, so that no one could truly challenge his strength.

Weapon: Morgenstern - a gigantic, 2 ton spiked mace, far too big and heavy for a normal human to lift. It's heavy blows make a mockery out of even the heaviest of armors. Vagruel swings it around with the same ease a human swings a toothpick.

Armor: Plate of the Fallen - A dark, ebony armor with an overall dark and menacing appearance. It also features several other spikes protruding from various parts of the body as well as six large horn-like spikes on the very top of the helmet, resembling a crown of sorts.

Skills: As per usual for high level overlords, Vagruel has 5 abilities, 1 passive and 4 active

Passive: Power of the Titans - His Titan heritage gives Vagruel enhanced strengthen and vulnerability

Active 1: Crush - His basic attack. A Slow but devastating swing of his mace.

Active 2: Ground pound - Vagruel hits the earth h with his mace sending out shock waves that deal low damage and have the chance to stun enemies.

Active 3: Wrath of the Titans - Upon use, Vagruel heals a quarter of his health and gains a strength boost for a short period of time.

Ultimate: Overpower - Vagruel's sheer size and appearance are enough to strike fear in the hearts of even the mightiest adventurers. When using this ability, weaker creatures have the chance to submit totally to his will.

Weaknesses: Like all Titans he is incapable of using magic. While his armor is unbreakable, it is vulnerable to magic and curses.

Starting Empire: Several Towns and Castles under his control. Countless subjugated humans, all too afraid to betray him.

Starting Bases:

Mordheim - A gigantic, gothic castle, build specifically to accommodate Vagruel's size. Just as menacing and evil looking as it's overlord.

Hope's End - a fortress carved into the side of a Volcano. With decorative lakes of lava flowing inside.

Which do you choose as a starting base?
11111.title: Vagruel - The Last Titan

choices: Cragrig - The Barbarian King
More options
11113.title: Cragrig - The Barbarian or more options

choices: The Stronghold
Fort Unguska
111131.content:
Name: Cragrig

Alias: The Barbarian King

Age: 27

Sex: Male

Race: Human

Height: 6'7

Appearance: A tall, musclebound man. With blue eyes and long, flowing, black hair. Clad only in a fur loincloth.

Bio: Huboria is an arid desert continent that Cragrig hails from. The young barbarian inherited the throne from his father, by killing him in a duel in accordance to Huborian tradition. Cragrig was much more ambitious and power hungry than his father ever was, quickly conquering all neighboring tribes. Now that his continet stands united under his rule, Cragrig has his eyes set on the fertile soil and rich cities of neighbouring lands.

Weapon: The SkullCracker - A Double bladed, war axe, passed down from generations of Huborian rulers. It is enchanted with the strength of all of it's previous users, making its blows much more vicious.

Armor: Bare Chest - As per Huborian tradition, all self respecting warriors must not wear anything to protect themselves.

Skills: As per usual for high level overlords, Cragrig has 5 abilities, 1 passive and 4 active

Passive: Last Stand - The closer Cragrig is to death the stronger his attacks are.

Active 1: Chop - His basic attack. A fast and powerful swing of his axe, best used against unarmored or lightly armored opponents.

Active 2: Axe throw - Cragrig throws his axe at an enemy, after which he can use the weapon's arcane powers to call it back to his hand.

Active 3: Barbaric Bellow - Cragrig lets out a Barbaric roar, scaring and lowering the power of enemies with low courage.

Ultimate: Berserk - For a short time Cragrig gains increased damage and heals based on the damage he deals.

Weaknesses: Despite being a barbarian, Cragrig follows a code of honor. He punishes the cowardly and treacherous but he prizes and respects bravery and loyalty, regardless of if the person in question has the strength to back up his heroism

Starting Empire: Every kingdom in the desert land of Huboria. Hundreds of fearless, hardened warriors with undying loyalty to their king

Starting Bases:

The Stronghold. - A giant, well defended fortress carved into the side of a mountain. It is located deep within the Huborian wasteland

Fort Unguska. - A camp on the edge of the Huborian lands. Comfortably close to raid able kingdoms. While not well defended, there is an ancient statue in the middle know as the "Warlord's Monument" which significantly boost the morale of any Huborian soldiers residing there.

Which Base do you choose?
111131.title: Cragrig - The Barbarian King

choices: Head towards Washington D.C. Today will be the day you take over the world!
To fly you to Hawaii. You need a vacation.
Fly back to that White castle they just passed. You haven't had breakfast yet...
112.content: You are sleeping soundly in the master bedroom when your alarm clock goes off and loudly wakes you up. You smash it with your mighty fist and sit up in the bed. "Damn it!" you shout angrily "I was having such a wonderful dream about executing barney the dinosaur live on pay per view!" You get up out of bed and head into the bathroom to take a shower, brush your teeth and admire yourself in the mirror for far longer then is nessicery. You step out of the bathroom and walk over to the closent. "What should I wear today?" you say to yourself. You decide to wear your new outfit with the scary skull on the front. You put on your cape and boots then head out the door. As you walk down the hallway you run into Mr. Winslow, who greets you and walks with you to the front of the huge airship. You enter a large room with several people sitting at control panels pushing buttons and flipping switches, including the two pilots. The room has a large windshield that covers about half of the room and is made of the clearest bullet-proof glass money can buy. You can see a clear blue sky with fluffy white clouds outside passing by you as the ship speeds through the air. You take a seat up high in the back as Winslow takes a seat in front of you. You command the pilots to...
112.title: A new day of evil...

choices: Winslow discovers rock bombs and explosive pineapples
Winslow is captured and interrogated
Winslow manages to eliminate all but one of the obstacles
1121.content: adjust altitude and watch for malingerers then orders an all ahead full and declare war on a fleet of battle cruisers below to take no prisoners and gather up all the booty available and have the collection buckets lowered then send out air cover to patrol the rest of the ocean for surprises. I send Winslow on another suicide mission to locate a decent landing site and eliminate any threats. The island is covered with every known weapon man can think of in the form of plants, stones and natural debris.
1121.title: Head towards Washington D.C. Today will be the ...

choices: Let Ervai and Trace deal with it.
You and Prof. Dimitri can handle it.
11213.content:
Winslow reported as soon as he could to you.
"Sir there appears to be some sort of shield that we can'y penetrate nothing we try can get past it!"
What do you do?
11213.title: Winslow manages to eliminate all but one of the...

choices: Skydive down from the front of the airship
Ride down on one of your coolest air vehicles
Deploy the the big screen and annouce your arrival
1122.content: "Sir?" The head pilot responds with a confused look on his face. "Did you just say... Hawaii?" You lean back in your chair as a smile spreads across your face. "Yes, as a matter of fact, I did. Now do your job, flyboy." You say as you shoot him a glare. "I wasted the better part of last week cleaning up general Ervai's messes and some of our guys arn't even out of the hospital yet. I NEED a vacation." The pilot doesn't argue and him and his parter change course for Hawaii. In less than 3 hours a small island comes into view surrounded by a vast ocean. Seems you've made it, and it isn't even noon yet! You don't want to waste any time and get right to the fun, but an overlord has to make a grand entrance...
1122.title: Sun, surf, and EEEEEVIIIIIL!

choices: You pilot the N.S. around to the drive-thru
You park the N.S. in the parking lot and walk inside to order your food
You fire the missles...you like firing the missles
1123.content: "Stop, you fools!" You yell to the pilots as you notice a White Castle pass from your view on the ground below. The pilots stop immeditly and give each other confused looks. "Good, now activate the cloaking system and lower the ship to about 2,500 feet above the ground." They do so as you command Winslow to follow you to the jet hanger. When you get there you ask Winslow if your personal jet is ready to fly yet. "They just finished repairing and refueling it about an hour ago, sir." He replies. "Well then, I guess it was a good idea not to test the fire ant grenades on the mechanics after all." You say with a laugh. "Who did we end up testing it on again?" "I beleave it was your grandmother, sir." "Oh yeah! Is she out of the hospital yet?" "No, but she has regained most of her skin and the ability to feel pain." "Excellent, make sure you send a "get well soon" card to her in my name later." "Of course, sir." "Now, back to the matter at hand." You say as you climb into the Night Specter. "I'm going to get some food, you want anything?" "Curly fries and a diet soda, sir." Is what he said, but over the roar of the jets engines starting up all you heard was: "Cutie pies and a dead cobra grrr." "You angry about something?" You ask as the jet takes off. You fly it down towards the white castle you saw earlier. "Now where was... ah, there it is!" Well, you're at White Castle's, how will you get your food?
1123.title: The hunger of the overlord

choices: Destroy the remaining people in line
Complain loudly to the manager
11232.content: You fly the N.S. over to the nearby parking lot and fly down carefully into the only open space. Well, you managed to land the N.S. in the parking lot, but you scratched the living hell out of a nearby mini van. You then decide that the owner of the mini must have wanted it like that, otherwise the dumbass wouldn't have parked so close to the parking space of the overlord. You make sure to keyscratch "dumbass" into the other side of the mini van before going inside to remind them how to properly park their vehicle in the future. The inside of the W.C. is nice and cool with the indoor air conditioner on. Unforunately, it is one degree too cold for the overlord, so you decide to keyscratch "my nuts are freezing off, jerk" into the side of the nearby wall to remind them how to properly cool their establishment in the future. You then get in line to order your food. The line moves slowly, but you wait paitently to get your food...for about 5 minutes. That's it! You can't stand waiting any longer! What do you do?
11232.title: The public vandalism of the overlord

choices: Begin complaining about the hideous baby and its mother
Begin yelling various death threats and insults at anyone and everyone nearby
112322.content: You step out of the line and walk up to the counter where a young pimple-faced teenager appears to be taking the order of a woman and her disturbingly ugly baby. You slam your mighty fist onto the counter with enough force to cause intense pain in your hand and demand to speak to the manager. "I'll get him right away, sir!" The teenager exclaims in an annoying high-pitched voice. He then disappears into the back of the resteraunt leaving you alone with the lowly people standing in line. You look around the room and try counting the tiles on the walls to pass the time. But your gaze soon falls back onto the ugly baby you saw before and you decide to make a face at it. It decides to throw up on you. "Son of a bitch, right on my best uniform!" You scream in anger as the manager and the teenager walk back up to the counter. Upon seeing them you...
112322.title: The whining of the overlord

choices: Storm out and return to your base
Give these fools a reason to obey the overlord...
1123221.content:
"Sir, I-" The manager begins to say, but you interrupt him before he can get any farther. "Manager, that infant has spewed its vile stomach contents upon my magnificent uniform! I sorely hope your pathetic little burger joint is prepared to deal with this kind of behavior!" You say as you point your finger at the annoying urchin, who is now smiling from ear to ear. "Er yes, what seems to be the problem here?" The manager asks as he adjusts his glasses. "I just told you what the problem was!" You say as you grab him by the tie. "I trust you have a firing squad ready?" "A what?!" He gasps as he pulls his tie out of your hands. "Just what the hell is going on out here?!" Although it tests your patience to recount everything that had happened in the past half-hour you do so as everyone in line begins complaining about having to wait longer.

One minute and 2 painful disintegrations later...

"...and that's when you asked me what was going on here." You finally finish. He looks at you for a moment before asking: "So, you're an overlord?" "Yes."

"You have a flying base?"
"Un-huh."
"You flew here in a modified fighter jet?"
"That's it sitting out there in the parking lot on the two handicapped spaces."
"Now you're mad because some baby threw up on you?"
"YES. FINALLY. Now if you would be so kind as to-"
"Get the hell out of my resteraunt or I'm calling the police."
"MOTHERF-"
1123221.title: This morning has been rather sucky...

choices: "Kill everything inside!"
"Follow me over to that Burger King, I don't want White Castle anymore..."
11232212.content: Enough is enough. You've had it with these fools and their puke-spewing infants. You decide to finally show them the true horror of an angry overlord. You activate your wrist communicator and tell general Mindlock to send down a squad of your minions to deal with these restaurant-goers. He confirms that a group is on their way and will be there shortly. You wait for a few minutes as people yell at you and talk on their cell phones. Amazingly, the ones on the cell phones are more annoying then the ones calling your mother a- oh look! Another ship is landing nearby and people are getting out. Your minions have arrived! You go outside to greet them and compliment their pilot who did such a good job driving them here. "Okassh, I'm drunk! Y'all git, I'm out this piessh!" He stutters as the doors close and he tries to fly back to your airship, unaware that a billboard seems to be caught on the ships wing. Your troops line up and report for duty. "Excellent..." You say as you stroke your goatee. "Now I want you to..."
11232212.title: Reinforcements

choices: Say, is that the president over there in that corner?
Wait... THIS IS MCDONALD'S!!!!! Your idiot minions went to the wrong place!
112322122.content:
"GO! GO! GO!" The troops commander yells out as they surround the eating establishment. Most take cover in the bushes out front or along the outside walls. Two snipers get into position in some nearby trees, three enter the ventilation systems, and one hides in the play place near the big glass window. The commander kicks down the front door and fires a gun into the air which hits one of your guys who got stuck in the ventilation system. Blood pours from the hole in the ceiling as he tells everyone to get on the ground. A man grabs his order from the other side of the drive through window and speeds off.

"All clear, send him in."

"Roger."

One of your minions opens the door for you and you step inside. In the background you can hear sobbing and horrified whispers. You smile and walk up to the front counter where a horrified cashier is trembling, praying for you to just order your food and leave. You are about to tell her what you want when you notice something odd...
112322122.title: Storming the (burger) kings castle

choices: A big mac
A happy meal
1123221222.content: You take a quick look around. There's the stupid looking clown, there's the all his hideous friends, there's the golden arches, THERE IS THE F***ING SIGN RIGHT OUTSIDE THE FRONT DOOR! Yep, you're in the wrong place. Good thing you know how to handle disappointment. You think of a number between 1 and 10. "Okay minions, I'm thinking of a number that happens to be between one and ten, what is it?" They all shout out what they think it is, with only one of them getting it right. You call him over to you and ask his name. "Minion #154, Ven." He replies as you give him a smile. "Well, guess what #154? When we get back home you're on abomination clean up duty!" His face loses all color behind his mask and he lets out a shriek of terror. "No sir, please! It makes such big droppings! The smell alone killed the last overlord!" You shove him away and ignore his pleas as you decide to just order something to eat here. What do you get?
1123221222.title: Here's your McFail burger! Want fries with that?

choices: Take over the world!
Fishing trip with Mindlock and Dimitri
11232212222.content: You buy a crappy meal and head back to the Night Specter to drive home as your minions wait for their transport to arrive. You scratch a large truck as you pull out and rip its mirror off as you fly up into the air. You enter the airships massive hanger and land your plane on one of your minions, not that you care. "I'm going to eat in my room, no calls." You say as you jump down to the floor and kick your boots off. "Hey! Your boots don't go there!" One of your maids call out as she sweeps up a pile of dust. "I'll get it later, geez..." You groan as you enter the hallway that leads to your chamber. "I want a raise!" She yells as you slam the door to your room shut. You walk over to your computer and begin playing the most emo music you can find. As you eat your meal and listen to your music you bring up and check todays schedule. You check off "get breakfast" and move on to the next item...
11232212222.title: What will you do today?

choices: "Mobilize, send out the first wave of attackers, begin my siege on the world!"
"Take us to the world capital, we'll bring the fight to their front door..."
112322122221.content: A grin slowly spreads across your face as you read the next order of business. Take over the world. This is it, no more kiddy crap or stupid B.S. Today will be the day you finally destroy your enemies and take over the world. You finish your meal and put the toy you got into your plastic treasure chest. You decide to change into your special reinforced battle suit and grab all your coolest guns and gizmos. You step out of your room fully armed and head to the main assembly hall and call everyone for a meeting. You stand proudly in front of your vast hordes and allow a small chuckle to escape your lips before you begin. "Today, my soldiers, is the day we claim this world for ourselves and begin a new reign! We will do away with peace and justice, purge goodness from the land, and take all the blocks off every t.v. in the world! Join me in our final fight for evil and help me to rule this land with an iron fist! Let us now take this entire planet and shroud it in a blanket of eternal night!" The crowd cheers and gives you a standing ovation. Apparently, you have pleased them with your rousing speech and gained their undying loyalty. "Excellent." You sneer as you give the attack orders.
112322122221.title: The world will soon be all yours...

choices: "T.A.N.K. and prepare my combat suit... I'm going in!"
"Abomination, that should make things... interesting..."
1123221222212.content: "We'll hit those bastards first and bring them down before they even know what happened! I'll see Ervai's head on a spit before this day is over!" You scream over the loudspeakers in your twisted rage. "Deploy all units and tell them to head for the capital!" Engines roar to life, heavy weapons are reloaded, and novelty bumper stickers are placed carefully upon all of your crews favorite vehicles. The main airship, your base, fires its turbo engines into action as badass-looking black flames erupt from behind it. "Send out the first wave!" You command as your approach your destination. "Once the initial strike is completed we can send out the second wave." One of your minions rushes into the control room and up to your throne. "Sir, our forces are engaging the enemy and a massive firefight is breaking out below!" You smile evilly as you send him back to his post. "Ah, so its finally begun... Computer, relocate my throne to the big clear window at the front of the ship. I wish to watch the ants burn beneath me." The computer confirms your command and your throne hovers through the air and stops 2 feet away from the main window. "Mmm... perfect." You whisper as you look at the war zone on the ground below you. Soldiers on both sides run in circles as they are torn to shreds by gunfire and missiles. "Ah, seems our boys could use a hand... deploy the..."
1123221222212.title: The first wave

choices: You land in the center of the battle field
You land on top of a nearby  Walmart
11232212222121.content:
"You're going in yourself, sir?!" Your minions all ask in unison. You chuckle lightly and clench your fist. "Yes. I shall see an end to them all personally, NOW PREPARE THE T.A.N.K. AND MY BATTLESUIT!" You minions shiver from the sheer volatileness of your voice, but quickly type in the commands on the computer. In a few seconds you are whisked away by a drone and taken to a conveyor belt that quickly suits you up in the newest and most high tech version of battle armor your scientists have created. Once you are fully geared up the belt dumps you in the massive cockpit of the T.A.N.K. and closes the hatch. A hologram of a distinguished older gentleman in a suit appears and greets you as the T.A.N.K. finishes refueling. "Pfft, boring." You say as you activate the radio and ask your central command if they ever got done with project SEX-E 09. "Um... yes. Just type in the name on the keyboard and hit enter..." One of them replies in a nervous voice. You do as they say and the butler hologram disappears and a new one flashes to life. Now I can't describe what it looks like in a 13+ rated interactive so use your imagination...

No, not that much you pervert! God god, what is wrong with you? Anyway the hologram informs you in a smooth sexy voice that all systems are go and deployment is ready whenever you are. "Huh...? Oh! Oh! Right!" You shout embarrassingly as you zip your suit back up. "Deploy the T.A.N.K. in the center of the battle field!" The ground beneath you begins shaking and you suddenly feel yourself free-falling through the sky.
11232212222121.title: Death from above!

choices: Get out and get a battery for the MEC, you'll need all the firepower you can get
Drive back to the battlefield and make due without the MEC
112322122221212.content: You land right in the middle of a crowded Walmart just down the street and kill hundreds as your massive war machine plows through the ceiling and into the home/gardening aisle. "Whoopsie sweetie, we seemed to have missed our targeted area." The hologram informs you as she poses on top of the keyboard. "I'm aware of that." You say as you get up off the floor and rub your head. "Exactly where did we land?" She gives you a cheerful smile and does a naked backflip. "Walmart of course, otherwise known as the biggest hellhole on earth according to the data base." You get back into your seat and look over a damage report that pops up on the main screen. All of the major systems are fine, but the mounted electro cannon is in need of a new battery. "Great, I thought I just got that thing a new battery last week..." You groan as you run a scan on the rest of the T.A.N.K. It seems everything else is fully loaded and in perfect condition.
112322122221212.title: Off by a little...

choices: Just get the battery, you can buy your DVD later...
Just steal them... you are an evil overlord after all...
1123221222212121.content: You let out a sigh and rub your forehead. "Guess I better get that battery, knowing my luck it'll probably be vital in taking the capital." You say as you climb out of the hatch and tell the hologram to make a note to execute the craphat who made the MEC battery powered. "Sure thing, hon." She calls out as you slam the hatch back down. You jump to the floor and decide to merrily skate through the massive puddle of blood that has formed from your brutal massacre, only tripping on a few of the mangled bodies on your way to the electronics section. When you get there you realize that the new season of your favorite t.v. show comes out on DVD today. After checking the price you quickly reach into your pocket to count up your money. "Blast, I don't have enough for both!" You shout in a rage. What now?
1123221222212121.title: Running errands

choices: RUN!
Admit your crime and beg for mercy...
11232212222121212.content: You grab both the battery and the DVD with an evil smile on your face. After stuffing them both under your clothes so no one will see them you begin to walk back to the T.A.N.K... only to have an employee stop you and ask if you stole anything. A bead of sweat pours down your face as you lie through your teeth. "Uh, no. No sir. In fact I hate batteries and DVD's inappropriate for small children. I've never even seen all the episodes in season one including the controversial episode 5 with the wardrobe malfunction and naked dancing space aliens." The man gives you an intimidating stare. Well, as intimidating as a 40 year old toothless, hairless, virgin, overweight Walmart employee can manage. "If you are indeed telling the truth, then just what is that under your uniform?" He asks as he points to a battery and DVD shaped bulge on your belly. "Crap, I KNEW I shouldn't have asked them to go with the scrotum crushing skintight leather when they made this suit..." You grumble as you try to think of a way to get out of there...
11232212222121212.title: Busted! (By stupidity...)

choices: Run left!
Run right!
112322122221212121.content: A single thought passes through your mind: "Running ALWAYS works!" Without hesitation, you knee the man in the groin and run like hell back towards the T.A.N.K. The assaulted employee laments the fact that he is no longer able to have children, but quickly calls for backup on his phone. The man on the other side remains silent for a moment before inquiring why in god's name is a chipmunk calling him on the security line and sends out some guys to check things out. You are almost back to the gardening aisle when a high powered laser blast just misses you and collides with another shopper, disintegrating them on contact. You turn around and gasp when you see three Walmart super soldiers closing in on you with their hover mopeds. (Yes, you read that right.) The one in front fires another blast and blows away an entire shelf of shampoo and soap, much to the delight of nearby kids who hate taking baths. You soon come to the end of the aisle you are on and are faced with a quick decision: Turn left and try to get to the T.A.N.K. in the gardening aisle... or turn right and try to lose them in the clothing department?
112322122221212121.title: Damn! They really stepped up their security!

choices: Through the front doors. Duh.
THROUGH THE UNDERGROUND SUPER SECRET LABORATORIES! OMG!
1123221222212121211.content: You need to get back to the T.A.N.K. as soon as possible if you want to help your troops before they are wiped out. With a deep breath you begin running as fast as you can towards the gardening aisle. The super soldiers begin to get closer, but you pull over a huge diaper display that causes one of them to veer off course and crash into a large stack of bean bags. The other two manage to turn around it and resume fire once you are back in their line of sight. "Blast! I didn't think they'd be this determined! They must be paid above minimum wage..." You mutter as you run up to the T.A.N.K. and begin climbing inside. You make a rude gesture at them as they fire off a few more shots and disappear into the safety of your massive war machine. "Greetings sweetie, would you like a l-" The hologram begins, but you cut her off before she can finish. "There's no time for sexy now! Give me the location of the closest exit so that we may return to the battlefield!" She performs a scan of the Walmart and reveals that the nearest exit is...
1123221222212121211.title: Exit stage left!

choices: Open fire on them!
Turn around and go the other way...
11232212222121212112.content: "Huh... I didn't know they had super secret underground laboratories..." You say with a puzzled expression. "Ah well, I guess that's why they are secret. Prepared to tunnel downward!" The hologram giggles and the T.A.N.K. begins moving down through the earth with its mighty drills. In a few seconds you fall about 50 feet into a massive underground tunnel that happens to be brightly illuminated and made of metal. Really shiny metal. You quickly drive down the tunnel with your weapons ready to fire. Before you know it you come up to a massive steel door with a sign that reads "Employees only." on it just below a mounted turret system. The turrets don't seem to notice you or open fire. What now?
11232212222121212112.title: Where the hell did they get the funding for this?!

choices: You realize your mistake and begin powering up the weapons system
The enemy heard you and is closing in on your position
112322122221212121121.content: Life is but a game of chess, every move must be well thought out if you plan on surviving. However, you suck at chess and can't even remember what that damn horse piece is supposed to do. Without thinking for a moment of the consequences, you fire every weapon you have at the door. Several small fiery explosions begin covering it with the occasional large explosion sounding throughout the empty hall like thunder. When the smoke created from your hellish barrage clears the turrets, the door, and even the nice sign are completely untouched. "Huh, I thought for sure that would work...." You say as you perform a scan to see what the door is made of. A message pops up on screen informing you that this mighty door is made from... foam rubber. "That can't be right!" You scream in anger, without noticing the other message displayed under the first one. As it turns out, the T.A.N.K. is only at 1% maximum power. Guess you should have let it charge before trying to fire any loud, noise making weapons...
112322122221212121121.title: The first attack is yours!

choices: Quietly instruct the hologram to begin charging the T.A.N.K. for battle
Send out the hologram to distract them while you escape
1123221222212121211212.content: As soon as you look up from the screen you notice that you are surrounded by everything from tanks to pink effeminate-looking trucks with ribbons and bows wrapped around them. "Well, looks like we're surrounded sugar. Should I go out and distract them while you power up the T.A.N.K.?" The hologram asks innocently as you try to access the situation. "Negative, just turn on the outer speakers!" You command as you pick up a mic sitting on the side of your chair. "Okay, its on, go for it! Go all the way!" She shouts as she jumps up and down excitedly. "Okay then, watch as I talk my way out of this effortlessly. These fools won't know what hit them." You begin one of your long, annoying, evil laughs, but stop when you hear everything you just said echo off the walls outside. "I said it was on, dear." The hologram says, completely deadpan. You scratch your head and try to think of something, then an idea hits you. "Right, um guys? I'm coming out! Please don't shoot me!" You say as you...
1123221222212121211212.title: Well, that was quick!

choices: There is no choice... you'll have to fight them!
Screw that! I'm gonna keep running like a little bitch!
11232212222121212112122.content:
You open the hatch of the T.A.N.K. but you don't climb out. The solders begin to grow impatient and are just about to attack when a sexy leg sticks up out of the opening and slowly begins to twirl in the air. "This should work..." You say slyly as you prepare to gun it as soon as the T.A.N.K. charges a bit more. The solders are suspicious, yet can't help from staring at the hologram as she slowly makes her way out of the T.A.N.K. "Oh wow, she's even hotter then Fred's daughter!" One of them yells as the hologram poses and slows off her elegant form. "Hey man, what the hell?!" Another solder (presumedly Fred) screams as the others continue staring. "Its seems my distraction has worked... now to get the hell out of here!" You say excitedly as you start up the T.A.N.K. and speed off, leaving the bewildered troops to gaze longingly at the hologram, who was now floating in midair and doing something very inappropriate. "So long suckers, have fun jacking off to a computer program!" You laugh tauntingly as you speed down the tunnel away from them. Then you realize you've overlooked something. "Um, sugar...?" A familiar voice asks, sending a chill down your spine. "No..." You whimper as a warning pops on on your monitor screen. "You know I can only stay projected up to 300 yards away from my data base... right?" The hologram asks as she puts a hand behind her head.

Well S***... what now?
11232212222121212112122.title: Not well thought out...

choices: AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAleftAAAAAAAAAAAAAHHHHHH!!!!!
Oh god! Oh god! Um, right? OH GOOOODDDD!!!
112322122221212121121222.content: You bang your fist on the console and knock your coffiee mug on the floor, shattering it to pieces and getting hot coffiee all over the place. "Blast! Open rear view camera! Are they following us?!" You shout as you load some of the excess power to bring the T.A.N.K.s weapons online. A holograpic video image appears showing several enemy units in hot persuit of you. "Damn! I don't want to waste any power fighting them... increase speed and make me a fresh pot of coffiee!" The T.A.N.K. begins losing them... only for them to catch up as it quickly slows back down. "Aggghh! Whats wrong now?!" You yell as they open fire. "Power not addiqute to comply with speed request." The monitor helpfully informs you. "Also, we're out of coffiee beans, cream, sweetener, and you just smashed your only mug like, what, five seconds ago?" A deep red hue overtakes your face as a loud clang confirms a hit on your oversized war machine. You are about to give another order when a fork in the road appears up ahead. There are signs overhead displaying imformation about both directions, but you're going way too fast to read them. Time to make a choice before you crash... turn left or right?!
112322122221212121121222.title: One way... or another...

choices: Follow the sewage disposal tunnel to the sewer
Light a match?
1123221222212121211212221.content: You turn to the left just in time to avoid a firey crash... and scratch the crap out of your awesome paint job. A wall with a single small door looms in front of you as you give the order to slow down. You begin to skid to a stop, but it is not enough. Your eyes catch a gimpse of a sign overhead as you plow through the wall and off of a large metal platform. "S-sewage disposal?!" You gasp as the T.A.N.K. enters a brief freefall. Your landing is cushioned and puctuated with a loud splash that shakes the entire vechicle. "Well now, at least they stopped chasing us..." The hologram says with a grin, blissfully unaware of how lucky it is to not have a nose. "Christ, what were they eating?! I can smell it coming through the walls!" You groan as you activate the air purification system. "Oxygen levels returning to normal, smell of defication eliminated. What fresh scent would you like sir?" The computer asks as it flushes the foul air out. "Last time I chose pine scent... give me new car this time." You say as you slowly regain the ability to breathe. Now that that little issue has been taken care of, how do you plan on getting out of here?
1123221222212121211212221.title: This whole story is starting to stink...

choices: You are being "rescued"
There is in fact, an Agent X and they're coming for you
113.content:
Your secret base is on a deserted island, and it is not much of a base but a couple of abandoned wreckage from ships passing by that you have turned into a small unstable shelter. Your so-called "evil empire" consists of some wild apes that roam the island in search of fruit to steal - and instead of being an overlord, you're more of a crazy hermit, who has lost their mind after being stranded when the doomed ocean liner called the S.S. Tropic Princess got caught in a storm and crashed.

"Alright Mr. Winslow," you say to one of the apes that hangs around the shelter. The primate looks at you with confusion as it always does. "What is the status report? Have we located the whereabouts of Agent X?" Before it can answer, a powerful sounding of rockets and machinery is heard in the distance.
"What the hell? Dispense the minions! We are being attacked!" The apes start going crazy, screeching, and circling around the base. The skies begin to dark as if a storm is coming, but this appears to be the result of the unknown vehicle blackening the skies. "Mr. Winslow?" Your #2 is nowhere to be found, everyone who supposedly works for you is scattering.
113.title: Island of isolation

choices: He crosses without anyhting happaning
One of his Officers has a report for him
Sarah RUNs into him.
114.content:
Alex Burrows Moved down the hall of his underground Facility, he was jsut returning from a meeting with some of his officers about how everything was working out with his plans. Alex Looked rather out of place in most of the rooms of the base as he alwasy wore a dark blue suit with black tie, but with one look it was not question who was in charge of everything. Alex was the C.E.O of Delix, the leading corporation on eath in Computer Tech. and weapons development. That was waht the press and everyone else saw, it was jsut a front for his real work, comeplete and total control over the world government.

Alex had not alwasy planed this, but after seeing so many pointless wars and death( most of whitch were with his weapons) he had goten fed up with the constent bickering of the curent leader and had choose to take maters into his own hads. Now though Alex had these view he was not above killing, as he alwasy said. "there is a time and a place for everything." and that applyed to klling as well, when ever somthing needed to be removed, it was removed by the most effective measn, whether that was through finaces or "accadent" did not mater, as long as it furthered the goal.

He was aproching one of many of the four way juntions that were in the base, it didn't mater, he knew exactly where he was going. He started to cross the juntion and...
114.title: Welcom to the Outpost

choices: Onsecond thoought  Alex could use her help
Alex continues on
1143.content:
As Alex started to cross the hall he cought a glimps of somthing moving fast out of the cononer of his eye, be fore he could react somthing hit him hard, Now most people would have been knocked to the ground but the only reaction out of Alex was he moved his left foot and caught himself from falling as he grabed what hit him to keep it from falling, he saw very familiar blond hair with pink streaks in it. He sighed as he righted her then brushed himself off. he then tuened and looked into the very wide blue eyes of Sarah.

"SIR! I'm So, so so sorry! i didn't see you till it wa to late! i tryed to stop but i was move--"

"Forget about it, no harm done, I am uninjured and from waht I can see so are you." Alex said, thought Sarah didn't quite agree with Alex's plans she was a hard worker who got her work done right and on time without having to be told twice to do anyhting, in short, she was a skilled employee.

"But sir( every one called Alex "sir") i could ahve injured you. and --"
"But you didn't so there is no problem.....why were you running anyways?" Alex asked.

"The captain told me to get him some coffee and to hurry so i--"

Once agian Alex cut ehr off. "And you were running? you know your only supposed to run if we fall under attack or you have a message of the up-most importance for ME. Getting coffee for Your captain does not reqire running, even more so if he is too lazy to get it himself." Alex said, he ahd had the same prople with her captain, he alwasy wanted her to run every where and get the most useless things ever( coffee was not high on the list of useful things with alex, he didn't like the stuff and never drank it) and had already spoken to ehr captain before and knew why he had sarah runing every where, the guy liked watching her backside as she ran, of couse th captain ahd no clue Alex knew this and if it wasn't for the fact of needing every man he could( and the fact the guy could tell som on eof alex's plan) he would ahve been gone along time ago as alex did not tolerat that sort of behavior. "Think about it, if you were to run with the coffee you would most likly spill it and then injure yourself and we can't hve that, infact...i'm oreirng you NOT to get him coffee, ever. If he has a problem tell him he can come talk to me." Sarah stood straighter when he gave ehr the order.

"Sir, Yes Sir!" She said.

"And if you start having proplems with him, even the slightest let me know and i will transfer you to another department. Alex was many thing, a good employer was one of them.
Sarah nodded. "Ok sir"

"Anyways you are dismissed."

"ok Sir" She said saluting and starting to turn away.
1143.title: And as always Sarah

choices: "Prepare me a flight to Brazil, I'll deal with this matter personally..."
"Withdraw our troops, set up a meeting with the UN. We must use diplomacy."
11432.content:
Alex was not far from his destination when a panicked agent came running up to him with sweat pouring down his face. "Sir, we have an emergency situation we need you to deal with!" He said out of breath as he saluted his superior. "What is the problem?" Alex asked in a calm tone. "I'm sorry sir, but there's no time to explain, please accompany me to the war room where we can brief you on the situation." Alex nodded and followed the man to a large spherical room with large monitors displaying maps and various important data. "Sir, thank god you're here!" A man called from the other side of the room when his eyes fell upon his leader. It was general Mindlock, the man who had single-handily won over 100 battles for Alex and his organization. "Ah, general, good to see you again." Alex said in a friendly tone as the man saluted him. "I wish I could say the same, sir, but I'm afraid I have ill news to deliver... A war has begun." Upon hearing this Alex's ears perked up and he gave his top general his full attention. "A war using our own weapons." The general continued in a grave tone. "A large group of rebels sized control of two of our shipments off the coast of Brazil and held several people hostage with them. This was a few days ago and things like this weren't uncommon so we decided to send a squad of your special ops down there for a rescue and recovery mission... Unfortunately, it was all a trap. The rebels executed several of the hostages and blamed the massacre on our weapons.


Our team of special ops who had just arrived only served to make things worse. Now the whole country is threatening to rise up against us. Yesterday we sent an ambassador of peace to calm things down while we dealt with the rebels. Unfortunately, the meeting went sour and our company was once again blamed. We believe the rebels planned this as they've now gained the support they needed to go to war... if this isn't stopped soon we'll have an army at our front door demanding retribution for the atrocities committed by these... these terrorists!" Alex was silent for a moment as he went over everything he had just heard in his mind. "Goddamn it... have you identified the leader of the rebels?" Alex asked, worried of the involvement of his sworn enemy in this conflict. "No sir, our intelligence ops have failed to get a positive I.D. on the man. All we know right now is that he is a Caucasian male between the ages of 30 and 40... we currently have a list of over 1000 possible suspects. If we don't act now he'll succeed in igniting a conflict that could threaten the security of the entire world. If that happens it is likely the entire planet will eventually turn against us. We must act now... even if we are completely in the dark..." Alex nodded his head and gave an order...
11432.title: To war

choices: "How could I have known that the ambassador was carrying a dead-man's switch?"
Wips out machine gun. "I'm gonna take over the world here and now! Mwahahahah!"
114322.content:
You despairingly consider the situation for a few moments, but then steel yourself, remembering that there must have been some time in the past when things were looking this grim. Or possibly even worse!
"Sir!" Pipes up pone of the soldiers at a computer console nearby. "The list has just been updated. There are now more than five million probable suspects and climbing. We could send in the other Special Ops. teams. Working round the clock, they should be able to take out a sizeable number of the suspects by themselves-hopefully with the instigator amongst the casualties- before things heat up too much."
You slowly shake your head, deciding that a mass-assassination might be slightly difficult to explain to the press on a short notice. If it had been four million instead of five, you could have simply told them there was a world-wide gas leak that killed a random group of fairly similiar people, numbering around four million. But five... That was pushing it.
"Alrighty then, General Mindlock, we are going to have to use the other approach." You declare. "Initiate code 'I-Hoped-It-Wouldn't-Come-To-This'." The General looks surprised, but then solemmly nods and moves to press the the small, inviting soft-blue button labeled 'lunch' on the command console.
"Gah! What are you doing? I meant call up the Night Specter-Damn! I love saying that, reeaaal slooowly; Night Specter, like that, see?-and fly me to the UN's international headquartes in New York City! Not 'fire all nukes'! And anyways, that's the 'lunch' button. The one you should have been going to flick is this one next to it, see? The switch labeled 'launch.' Oh well. They are quite similiar looking-Why, I confess I often get them mixed up myself, haha! Now, where's that Spectre..."

         Sometime later you're reclining on one of the luxury chairs in the Night Spectre, cotemplating what to tell the President of the World and his council of clueless cronies in regard to the deteriorating situation.
114322.title: The Nuke-saving approach to problems.

choices: In/on a volcano
In a large airship
On a desurted island
Underground
In New Jersey
12.title: Home is where the (enemies) heart is

choices: "We take over the world!"
"I head over to the mall for some shopping!"
"Shall be our vacation day! Everybody to the beach!"
123.content: You sigh deeply as you wake up in your large queen-sized bed. You were having such a wonderfully horrible dream, it seemed like a shame to have to wake up and leave it. "Oh well. I guess now I can torture the prisoners at least..." You say as you step into your slippers and walk over to huge glass window to watch the sun rise. It was quite beautiful, but you had things to do so you quickly head to the bathroom and began taking a shower. Once that is done you move over to your closent and pick out the outfit you will be wearing for today, a sexy and stylish uniform that showed off your exquisite beauty. You are admiring yourself in a mirror when your hear a knock at the door. "Hmm... enter." You call out without bothering to look and see who was there. "U-um yes, good morning m'lady." It was mr. Winslow, one of your better minions. "Pardon my intrusion... every one is waiting for todays orders." You turn and give him a sly smile. "Ah yes, tell them I'll be out in a minute. I have quite a few plans for us today..." Mr. Winslow bows and then excuses himself. After an hour has passed you step outside and head to the control room. "Attention everyone..." You say over the loud speaker. "Today..."
123.title: The lady overlord awakens...!

choices: You decide to make a big entrance to impress your minions
You decide to jump right into the fun as soon as you arrive
You decide to help your minions get ready for the party they're having later
1233.content: Minions throughout your base simply stared at the loudspeakers for a few moments in surprised silence before erupting in joyous cheer. "FINALLY, A DAY OFF!!!!! HURRAY FOR THE OVERLORD!!!!!" You smile at a stunned mr. Winslow as the two of you listen to the loud applause and yelling echoing all across the base. "What?" You ask innocently. "I said I had quite a few plans for today... just wait and see what else I have planned..." Not long after the announcement pencils are dropped, papers are pushed aside, and everyone from your highest ranking minions to the lowly grunts are rushing down the hallways in their swimsuits, all eager to get outside and begin their day off. You walk down the hallways towards the main exit by yourself after Mr. Winslow decides to leave to grab his trunks. You had this day off planned for next week, but decided screw it, you don't want to wait any longer. The sunlight hits you and warms you up as you step outside and head over to the Doom buggy parked next to the path leading down the mountain towards the sea. You climb in, hit the radio, and drive towards the massive beach located just below your fortress. Your day off had officially begun!
1233.title: A day at the beach

choices: Find a "creative" way to get your job done...
Play a prank or two using the crates and shrinkray...
12333.content: You drive onto the soft sand of the beach and get out. From the looks of things everyone is getting ready for the party later. "I guess I'll help everyone get set up." You say with a sly smile. "And maybe I can have some fun while I'm at it..." You walk over to Dr. Clare, one of your top minions and ask what she is doing. "Oh, g'day ma'am." She replied in a soft voice. "I'm setting up the DNA splicing both for later, would mind giving me a hand?" You smile. "Certainly... What do you need me to do?" She scratched her head for a moment. "Hmmm... could you move those crates over by the tent to the otherside of the beach? Just be careful, there are a lot of dangerous mutants and such inside some of them..." You walk over to the stack of crates and pull out your shrinkray. "Guess I best get to work..." You say as evil ideas begin to fill your head...
12333.title: Work or play?

choices: Find someone else you can "help"
See if the food is ready yet, you could really go for a burger or hotdog...
123331.content: First, you shrink each of the crates to about the size of a baseball and activate your jet boots. You grab a few and fly up into the air. You active the C.L.A.W. and hurl one of the crates as hard as you can towards the other side of the beach. It hits a seagull nest and breaks open. A green goo covers the eggs and they begin glowing bright green. "Damn! Do over!" You shout cheerfully as you hurl another crate, this one hits a sand castle someone made and exploded. The sand castle began to crumble and fall apart just in time for the minion to return and begin crying in frustration. He must have worked really hard on that! "Whoops... Oh well, I'll get some more crates and try again!" You say as you fly back down to the beach. The next few minutes are filled with screams and tears. Your underlings will never forget the pain and suffering you inflicted upon them on this day... God knows what will become of poor minion #013! Okay what next?
123331.title: INCOMING!

choices: Go for a refreshing swim
Find a way to get the food ready sooner...
1233312.content: Terrorizing you own troops can sure make a girl hungry! You fly back down and land softly onto the sand right next to general Mindlock, who just so happens to be grilling burgers, hotdogs, and part of a mutant tentacle that landed on the grill only a few minutes ago. "Is the food ready yet?" You ask as you rub your stomach. "Hmm? Oh, no ma'am. It should only be a few more minutes though." You sigh and cross your arms, you really don't want to have to wait for the food to cook, but it seems like you'll just have to wait. You stand there for about 5 seconds before you can't stand it any longer. "Agh! This is so boring! I need something to do!" General Mindlock turns a burger and listens to it sizzle as you glare at it, willing it to cook faster. "Yes, it won't be long now. You should probably go for a swim, from what I hear the water is nice and cool. You'll have to wait an hour after you eat if you don't do it now, so why not?" He had a point...
1233312.title: Tentacle, the other white meat!

choices: Volleyball!
Breathing contest!
12333121.content: You give the uncooked food one last glare as you storm off and walk down towards the bight blue ocean. When you get there you take off all your electronic gear and put it down next to a tent where it'll be safe while you swim. You get a running start and jump into the water, diving under for a few seconds before resurfacing in the warm sunlight. The water was the perfect temperature, both cool and refreshing. You dive under again and swim past a large school of small silver fish. "Wow, so pretty!" You say, forgetting that you happen to be underwater at the moment. You choke and resurface with a burning nose the taste of salt water on your tongue. "Ugh. Maybe I should just play a game or something..." You say between coughs. You look around at all the other people swimming nearby. There is a group playing volleyball a little closer to the shore and another one seems to be seeing who can hold their breath the longest underwater. Which activity looks more fun?
12333121.title: A nose full of water

choices: Time to cheat!
You play honorably...
123331211.content: You swim over the group of people playing volleyball and ask if you can join. "Sure!" One of your female minions yells as she waves her arms back and forth. "Its boys vs girls so you'll be on our side!" You dive under the net and resurface next to the minion that called to you, who turns out to be #822, Sarah. "Hey, I remember you!" You call out as the ball splashes not five feet from where you are. "Point to the guys." One of the swimmers on the other side calls out. "Oh, dang it!" You shout out as you turn away from Sarah and get ready to hit the ball if it comes in your direction. "See what you did #822? Because I was talking to you I missed the ball and gave the other team the lead!" Sarah frowns and bows her head. "I-I'm sorry, mistress. Please forgive me." You glare at her for a moment, but soon stop when you realize that you can't stay mad at her. "Okay, just don't let it happen ag-" *Splash* "Another point to the guys." You turn around to see the ball floating in the water next to your side, mocking you with its floatingness. You bite your lip and try to contain the violent surge of curse words building in your throat.
123331211.title: Distractions...

choices: Move in to knock the ball back over the net!
Let Sarah handle it...
1233312112.content: Normally you wouldn't be above cheating, but this was personal! You would feel satisfied unless you beat the other team fair and square. The ball comes at you a third time... and you knock it up into the air where another member of your team spikes it over the net. "Point to the girls." The next few minutes are filled with the sound of splashing water and petty childish insults from both teams as the game continues. One of the minions on the beach calls out to you and tells you that the food is ready, only to be ignored completely as you spike the ball over the net so hard it knocks someone out as it bounces off their face with a painful "whap" noise. Soon the sky begins to grow dark as the western horizon is dyed a deep red and orange hue. It would be truly breathtaking to look at... if you weren't so busy with your game. The score stands at 999 to 999... the next point will decide the winner! One of the guys serve the ball and it heads straight for Sarah! Quickly you...
1233312112.title: Showdown at sundown...

choices: "Oh yeah, its on now!"
"Pass, I'd rather do something else..."
12333121122.content: ... *WHAP!* *splash splash* "Point to the guys. Guys win." It appears the ball has stricken Sarah in her face and fallen into the water, losing you the game. Every member of your team stares in shock at you, their very expressions saying: "WTF?! Why didn't you hit the ball when you had the chance?!" The awkward silence is broken only by the cheers of the other team as they head for the beach to get something to eat. You don't really care though, its just a game after all, and nobody likes a sore loser. "Heh, guess you dropped the ball on that one, Sarah." You say with a corny smile on your face. Everyone on your team groans and begin heading towards the shore, looking forward to some tasty BBQ and a break from your stupid puns. You follow them and everyone has a big meal while sitting around the huge bon fire. The burgers, hotdogs, and even the occasional tentacle are delicious. After finishing off the last of your food and throwing away your plate you see the guys and girls from the volleyball game walking over to a net they set up on the beach. They must be having a rematch! Will you join them?!
12333121122.title: I think that pun just killed me a little inside...

choices: You react at the last second and hit it back, winning the game
You miss it and lose the game, again
123331211221.content: Now's your chance to regain some of your dignity (but not all of it, that pun destroyed any chance of that). You walk up and declare loudly that you wish to join. Both teams agree on the condition that you and Sarah be as far away from each other as possible. Once that is settled the game begins and the guys serve the ball. You jump up and spike it effortlessly into the sand on the other side. "Point to the girls." Says the same dude as before. The game goes on almost exactly as it did before and it comes down to the final serve in no time. The score once again stands at 999 to 999, same as before, fail this time and you be a bigger laughing stock then that minion who kept shocking himself by licking the little light bulbs on your christmas tree at the party last year. God, that was an awesome party, too bad you drunk all that eggnog and made out with that other chick. Oh well, everyone's probably forgotten about that... and she was pretty hot. Well, except for that tacky shirt she was wearing, seriously, who wears brown and pink together with orange? She looked like mutant barf! Man, that was a sucky christmas party... Wait weren't you supposed to be doing somethin- OHCRAPHERECOMESTHEBALLSTRAIGHTATYOU!
123331211221.title: Seriously though, that party was epic!

choices: Time to begin the day!
Wallow in despair and self pity...
1233312112211.content:
You leap into the air and smack the ball as hard as you can over the net, all the while imagining fireworks and doves flying by in the background. The ball falls to the sand and everyone lifts you into the air. "Point to the girls. The girls win... by the way, you suck at handling the ball Jerry. Yeah that's right... I saw you picking your nose out there. You should be ashamed... to an extent... now. Do do do... meh, now I'm bored, guess I'll go watch some porn." And so, the overlord and her minions partied into the night, Winslow got drunk and made out with a jellyfish, and the guy who kept score watched porn. A lot of porn. Including stuff that happened to be illegal in all but 27 countries. Sadly, due to the risk of national security we can't reveal their names. All we can say is that 8 begin with the letter Z, 12 begin with the letter Q, and one is ruled by a monkey with machine gun arms...

The next day...

The overlord awoke naked on the beach surround by beer bottles and clothes. "Oh... god, what happened last night?" She said as she rubbed her forehead. She had a massive hangover and seemed to be laying next to someone else. "Wait, don't tell me..." Then her eyes fell on a shirt that was pink and brown and orange. The resulting scream caused two earthquakes along with one tiny little baby earthquake.
1233312112211.title: DA WINNAH! YAY! WINSPLOSION! >:D

choices: "Taking a trip to the mall, I need some new clothes..."
"Taking over the world!"
12333121122111.content: "Oh well." You say as you begin putting your clothes back on. "Still better then that time this happened with a cactus." After you are decently dressed you activate your jet boots and fly back up to your base. Once there, you change into a new outfit and hit the button that summons a giant megaphone on the side of your base. You point it towards the beach and very rudely wake everyone there up with a loud scream. Now that you have everyones attention you tell them to hurry up and get back to work. In less then an hour several miserable hung-over minions are typing on computers, mixing chemicals, and testing weapons while trying to stay awake. The weapons guys seem to have it the easiest, what with all the loud screaming and painful injuries keeping them alert and attentive. Mr. Winslow walks into the command room with a bandaged mouth and asks you what the plan is for today. You smile wickedly and begin speaking over the loudspeakers. "Good morning everyone! I trust you all enjoyed yesterdays little party? Well, today we're gonna get back on track by..."
12333121122111.title: Let there be hangovers for all!

info.brief_description: What would you do...if you were an evil overlord trying to take over the world?
info.description:
Ever wanted to just say "Good sucks. Evil is so much more fun!", put on a long dark cape, and command an army of hellish minions? Well, now you can! In this interactive you become a powerful overlord who wishes to take over the world, build an evil empire, and maybe eat some pudding. You have vast armies, destructive gadgets, and an inpenitrable H.Q. to help you in your quest. Use everything at your desposal as you set fit. Now get out there and take over the world...ALL HAIL THE OVERLORD!!!!!


List of characters


The overlord: That's you! The overlord is destructive, vile, and mean-spirted. Or maybe crude, nasty, and spiteful. OR maybe just misunderstood, its kinda up to you...

Appearence: However you want them to look. You can make them wear pink bunny pajamas for all I care.

Abilities: Whatever you want as long as they arn't some all-powerful planet destroyer. Give them a weakness or two to balance them out.


Important minions

These guys are all vital to your evil empire.


Mr. Winslow: He is your nervious 2nd in command who has a strong fear of...well, several things really, but mostly you. He is your typical yes-man who won't say no to even your most unreasonible requests. He has been your most loyal minion for several years.

Appearence: He has brown hair and is a little short. He always wears his business suit and tie. He also keeps his reading glasses, hankerchef, and gold pocketwatch on his person at all times.

Abilities: He can file paperwork, read over documents, find loopholes in contracts, and handle all the business aspects of your evil empire better then any lawyer or accountant in exsistence. He's also REALLY good at typing.


General Mindlock: He is in charge of the evil army under your command. He may seem cynical and sarcastic at times, but he takes his job seriously and will follow any and all orders given to him.

Appearence: Tall with short light brown hair along with a short beard and mustashe. He is never seen without his generals uniform.

Abilities: He is gifted with strong psycic powers, is an expert sniper who has never missed a target, and is a master of several combat styles(both bare- handed fighting and using weipons).


Dr. Clare: She is the head docter and medical expert who also experiments with various types of DNA in her free time. She is a bit odd, but genuinely cares for her patients and will do whatever she can to help.

Appearence: Tall, lean, and almays smiling. She has long curly blonde hair and is always wearing her docters coat and glasses.

Abilities: She is one of the worlds top neurosurgeons/scientists. She can perform heart surgery with a pencil or remove an inflamed appendix in less then a minute...by herself. She also has really good hearing(most likely the result of a DNA experament).


Prof. Dimitri: He is the head of your science section and makes all of your cool stuff(he even made your H.Q.). He takes pride in his work and thinks of himself as a mad scientist. He loves to tell jokes to his assistants and read complicated books on physics and mathimatics.

Appearence: He has grey hair and wears a lab coat. He often also wears a headband with tools attached to it.

Abilities: He is vary good with his hands and has an I.Q. of 197. His right eye also has x-ray vision as well as heat vision and night vision.


Trace: He is basicly a hired mercenary who will lend his services to whoever pays the most. He will do whatever you ask of him, but only if he gets a paycheck. There's been a bit of a tension between you and him ever since he killed a group of your minions for making fun of his sunglasses.

Appearence: He has slicked-back hair and wears a flame jacket and sunglasses.

Abilities: If it is alive, he can kill it. There are things others can do better then him, but he can do anything fairly well. The only thing he is not good at is fixing his broken microwave.


Other minions

Your less important minions are numbered #000 to #999.


Minion #267(Zack): He is a dedicated and loyal follower, but often causes trouble and breaks things by accident. Because of his willingness to follow any order and total disregard for his own well-being he is useful for sending on missions that other minions would rather avoid.

Appearence: He has light brown hair and always wears his minion uniform.

Abilites: He has amazing luck. He has been sent on over 22 suicide missions and never came back with more then a minor injury. He is also a decent mechanic.


Minion #339(Bob): He is often seen with his friend minion #499(Fred). He is laid back and often critises his fellow minions when they do something wrong. He loves coffie.

Appearence: He has short black hair and a small goatee. He is also a little fat and can barely fit into his minion uniform.

Abilites: Sleeping, eating, taking a break from his work, and playing poker.


Minion #499(Fred): He is best friends with minion #339(Bob). He often makes fun of anyone who can't get their job done. The only thing he likes more then hanging out with his friend is jelly-filled doughnuts.

Appearence: He has blonde spikey hair and is vary lean. He is 2 inches taller then Bob.

Abilites: Talking to Bob, making excuses to avoid work, and geting himself and his friend out of trouble.


Minion #822(Sarah): A simple-minded minion who doesn't like evil, but had to take a job as a minion to pay for collage. She seems to show up and disappear randomly which really annoys the people who work with her. Dispite being a minion for an evil overlord she would never do anything bad personaly.

Appearence: She has long blonde hair with pink high-lites. She also has blue eyes and often wears something in her hair(mostly ribbons). She never wears her minion helmet because it would mess up her hair.

Abilites: She is so cute and innocent that no one could stay mad at her for more then a minute. She can also cook and sew. (She once made sweaters for everyone on christmas.They were awful looking and a little itchy, but no one could bear to say anything bad about them).


Other characters

They may help you or they may hinder you. These are all the other major characters.


General Ervai: He is your greatest foe and is always trying to find some way to put a stop to your evil plans. He is not above breaking the law as long as it would help him defeat you.

Appearence: He is tall, loud, and imposing. He has brown hair and wears an eye-patch. He also always keeps his uniform spotless and expects his solgers to do the same.

Abilities: He is a human lie-detecter and is strong enough to pull a small tree up by its roots. He also commands an entire army.


The president: He is the president of the world government and leader of the free world. He is kind, but also amazingly stupid and immature. If you wish to rule the world you'll have to get rid of him.

Appearence: He has short grey hair and wears a blue suit with a red tie.

Abilites: Getting re-elected and maintaining world peace dispite the fact that he is an idiot. He can also give a great speech when he needs to.


Agent X: The world governments top agent. Nothing is really known about him/her.

Appearence: No photographs exist of agent X. Rumor has it that he/she wears all black and whose face is covered in a mask.

Abilites: Classified.


Jeff: He operates the black market in over 5 countrys and specializes in arms dealing. He will sell anything to the highest bidder, weither they are good or evil makes no difference to him. He also collects postal stamps.

Appearence: He never shows his face and always wears a long overcoat. Sometimes he will also wear a hat.

Abilites: He can get you whatever you want...for a price. He always manages to escape the police and has never been caught. He is also a master at blending in with his surroundings.



Gadgets

Feel free to use all or none of these fearsome devices.


Shrinkray: A small hand-held device that can shrink things down to the size of a molocule. It also has a grow feature that can make things grow up to five times its normal size. The target can remain shrunk( or grown) for a maximum time of one hour. Uses AA batteries.

The C.L.A.W.: The C.L.A.W. is a metalic claw-shaped glove that can be worn on a hand or even a paw or tentacle. It is strong and sharp enough to cut through steel and can shoot lightning when it is fully charged.

Informer: A small gadget that looks like a high-tech wrist watch. It displays info on anything you would want or need to know about. It also has a handy scan feature that can be used to give you infomation on anything it scans. All this and it can access the internet too!

Jet boots: Let's face it, jetpacks are cool, but they are also clunky, heavy, and way too hard to control. Why risk being more easily injured when you could have everything a jetpack has in a smaller, sleeker package. These boots can do anything your old jetpack could do, only better and safer. Plus it runs on recycleable fuel cells that don't pollute the air like a jetpack would.

Laser gun: It shoots lasers and its a gun.

Evil cane: What looks like a harmless(yet awesome) cane is really one of your most powerful wepions. It can be wielded like a sword or...well, thats pretty much it...but it is really cool looking and indestructable to boot.

Sinister cape: It looks like an ordinary cape...because it IS an ordinary cape! Mwa ha ha ha...oh, and its fireproof.

The mindmaster: A remote control that can take control of anyone within 10 feet of you. Its effects last for 5 minutes at a time before needing to be recharged. If a mind controled person leaves its 10 feet radius at any time the effects wear off and the person is returned to normal.

Really stylish goggles: They do nothing!

Shuriken gun: Admit it, you've always wanted one of these. In addition to normal shuriken it can also shoot elemental shuriken.


Vehicles

Show off all your cool vehicles to your enimies.


Night specter: The night specter is your all-perpose personal jet. Armed with wepions and gadgets galore it has enough power to knock most other aircraft right out of the sky. Its also really cool looking.

Doom buggy: An all-terrian armored buggy that is equiped with several wepions and can also transform into a boat.

Hellishcopter: A fierce and intimidating battle helicopter that has duel machine guns, a long-range flamethrower, missle launchers, a mini-nuke, and cupholders.

The T.A.N.K: The T.A.N.K. is just like any normal tank...except ten times stronger and able to float on water. It is also faster then a normal tank.

Roadripper: You know that really cool motorcycle from Ghostrider? This is basicly the same thing.


Rules

1. You have complete control of the overlord, including their appearance, gender, and powers. Heck, they don't even have to be human!

2. Mild cursing is fine. No F bombs, S bombs, or slurs.

3. This story is mainly adventure/comedy. How much of each is up to you though, the story can be dead serious with few funny moments, or a grand comedy that can't take itself seriously for a minute. Using both in equal amounts is also encouraged.

4. Don't abuse the powers or gadgets, this is NOT an interactive for fetishes. Mild sexual content is allowed, just don't go overboard. If you want graphic sex stories go elsewhere.

5. Agent X, like the overlord, can have whatever attributes you see fit. Just don't make them too powerful.



I may make updates from time to time so don't forget to check this page occasionally and see if I've added any new gadgets or characters since the last time you read.
